statements: SELECT * FROM instrument_popularity;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instrument_popularity WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT instrument_name, date_recorded FROM instrument_popularity ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM instrument_popularity;
SELECT AVG(popularity_score) AS average_score FROM instrument_popularity;
SELECT id, instrument_name FROM instrument_popularity WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM instrument_popularity WHERE instrument_name = 'Piano' AND date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instrument_popularity WHERE popularity_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY popularity_score ASC, date_recorded DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM instrument_popularity;
SELECT instrument_name, AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_popularity FROM instrument_popularity GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING AVG(popularity_score) > 40;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_ranking FROM instruments WHERE popularity_ranking > 5;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%';
SELECT DISTINCT year_issued FROM instrument_popularity;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY popularity_ranking DESC, instrument_name ASC
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM instruments WHERE popularity_ranking > 50
SELECT * FROM instrument_popularity WHERE year_issued = 2021 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instruments JOIN instrument_popularity ON instruments.instrument_id = instrument_popularity.instrument_id WHERE popularity_score > 90
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score, year_issued FROM instruments JOIN instrument_popularity ON instruments.instrument_id = instrument_popularity.instrument_id WHERE year_issued < 2018
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instruments ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instruments WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT instrument_name, sale_amount FROM instrument_sales WHERE sale_amount < 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, month_year, popularity_rank FROM popularity_history ORDER BY month_year DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM instruments ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM instruments JOIN instrument_sales ON instruments.instrument_id = instrument_sales.instrument_id ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE popularity_score > 50 AND popularity_score < 80;

SELECT instrument_name, month_year, popularity_rank FROM instruments JOIN popularity_history ON instruments.instrument_id = popularity_history.instrument_id WHERE month_year >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY popularity_rank DESC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM instrument_sales;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE instrument_name = 'Guitar'
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity ORDER BY popularity_score DESC
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 50
SELECT * FROM InstrumentCategory WHERE category_name = 'Strings'
SELECT * FROM InstrumentHistory WHERE record_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE record_date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_instruments FROM InstrumentCategory GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT history_id, instrument_name, record_date FROM InstrumentHistory INNER JOIN InstrumentPopularity ON InstrumentHistory.instrument_id = InstrumentPopularity.instrument_id WHERE popularity_score < 40 ORDER BY record_date ASC;

SELECT artist_id, instrument_name, play_count FROM ArtistInstrument INNER JOIN InstrumentPopularity ON ArtistInstrument.instrument_id = InstrumentPopularity.instrument_id WHERE play_count >= 100 ORDER BY play_count DESC, artist_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentPopularity;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%';
SELECT category_name, instrument_name FROM InstrumentCategories JOIN InstrumentPopularity ON InstrumentCategories.category_id = InstrumentPopularity.instrument_id;
SELECT instrument_name, popularity_score FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT user_name, num_users FROM UserProfiles JOIN InstrumentUsage ON UserProfiles.user_id = InstrumentUsage.usage_id WHERE num_users < 100;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentCategories WHERE category_name LIKE '%string%';

SELECT InstrumentPopularity.instrument_name, SUM(InstrumentUsage.num_users) AS total_users FROM InstrumentPopularity JOIN InstrumentUsage ON InstrumentPopularity.instrument_id = InstrumentUsage.instrument_id GROUP BY InstrumentPopularity.instrument_id;

SELECT UserProfiles.user_name, InstrumentCategories.category_name FROM UserProfiles JOIN InstrumentUsage ON UserProfiles.user_id = InstrumentUsage.usage_id JOIN InstrumentCategories ON InstrumentCategories.category_id = InstrumentUsage.category_id WHERE InstrumentUsage.num_users > 50 ORDER BY InstrumentCategories.category_name ASC;
